about_the_game:
Overview

Project: Break//Down is a experimental 3D action-adventure brawler with a unique limb-based combat system. In this game Demo you explore the EZON complex's Storage Department a mass production and distribution facility secretly gone rogue in the shoes of 2 fools.

Smash, Bash, and Mash your enemies

Project: Break//Down utilises a unique physics based limb system where you can disable, dismantle and destroy your enemies, the limb system allows for dynamic flinch and ragdoll to allow for the satisfying feeling of weight and impact to every hit.

Explore the rogue EZON facility

Explore the facility after a secret robot revolution and discover the madness and shenanigans of the facility formed from laziness and incompetency.

content_descriptors.notes: mild violence, mature language, crude humour
